idea-plugin.name: GenAllSetter
idea-plugin.description:
GenAllSetter - Java Object Setter/Builder Generator

A powerful plugin for quickly generating and invoking all Set methods or Builder methods of a Java object. Say goodbye to manually writing repetitive assignment statements, prevent omissions, and reduce workload.

Key Features:

  • Generate all setter methods with optional default values
  • Generate setter methods with corresponding getter values from context
  • Support for Lombok @Builder pattern with chained assignments
  • Generate getter methods with variable declarations
  • Smart context-aware parameter and local variable detection

Usage:

Access via Generate menu (âŒ˜N on macOS, Alt+Insert on Windows) and choose from:

  • Generate All Setter - Basic setter generation
  • Generate All Setter With Default Value - Setters with default values
  • Generate All Setter With Getter - Smart setter generation using context variables
  • Generate All Builder - Support for Lombok builder pattern
